CSL::Key

Public Instance Methods

ascending?() click to toggle source 
# File lib/csl/sort.rb, line 45
def ascending?; !descending?; end
convert(item, processor) click to toggle source 
# File lib/csl/sort.rb, line 33
def convert(item, processor)
  case
  when has_variable?
    item[variable]
  when has_macro?
    processor.style.macros[macro].process(item, processor)
  else
    CiteProc.log.warn "sort key #{ inspect } contains no variable or macro definition."
    item
  end
end
descending?() click to toggle source 
# File lib/csl/sort.rb, line 47
def descending?
  has_sort? && sort == 'descending'
end
